content.html: We shouldn't judge people for not loving their jobs. Data: when people are intrinsically motivated at work, they see colleagues who share that motivation as more worthy of their help. Not enjoying work doesn't make anyone less moral. It's often a sign of a bad job or a bad fit.
content.value:
We shouldn't judge people for not loving their jobs.

Data: when people are intrinsically motivated at work, they see colleagues who share that motivation as more worthy of their help.

Not enjoying work doesn't make anyone less moral. It's often a sign of a bad job or a bad fit.
